On Friday 20 September 2002 08:34, Stefan Bodewig wrote:
> To run Ant's <junit> task with JUnit 3.8*, you need Ant 1.5 as Ant
> 1.4.1 and earlier use TestCase#name which has been deprecated in
> JUnit 3.7 and removed in JUnit 3.8.

TestCase(String) is neither deprecated in nor removed from 
Junit3.8(.1), see
http://www.junit.org/junit/javadoc/3.8/index.htm/allclasses-frame.html/junit/junit/framework/TestCase.html#TestCase(java.lang.String)
or the JavaDoc from the zip file.

What I read from the doc is that the no-atrg constructor is provided 
for serialization.
And (IMHO) for conveniance.

Robert
